ai-mil5.5.7:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, the Buddha has said these words:
ai-mil5.5.7:1.2_0: ‘A potter’s workshop remains and doesn’t provide a shop. The sky-god was rained down.’
ai-mil5.5.7:1.4_0: ‘Whose secret is the Realized One’s hut?’
ai-mil5.5.7:1.5_0: How can he be sought in the Realized One with his hut?”
ai-mil5.5.7:1.6_0: If it is a potter Ghaṭikāra’s monastery, a potter hasn’t been brought for the space to the wrong shade, so that it can be said.
ai-mil5.5.7:1.7_0: The Realized One could get a hut out of that repair of rain.
ai-mil5.5.7:1.8_0: this question too should be expelled by a each question.”
ai-mil5.5.7:2.1_0: “Great king, the Buddha has spoken about this:
ai-mil5.5.7:2.2_0: ‘A potter’s workshop remains and doesn’t provide a shop. The sky-god was rained down.’
ai-mil5.5.7:2.4_0: ‘Whose secret is the Realized One’s hut?’
ai-mil5.5.7:2.5_0: Ghaṭīkāra doesn’t get upset, thinking: ‘I’m ethical, of good character, who had my mother and father on the other side, and I looked down on the huts of the Buddha; I’m not able to get better.’
ai-mil5.5.7:2.6_0: The Realised One does not help, Great King,
ai-mil5.5.7:3.1_0: “Great king, however, the king of mountains goes forth, a hundred thousand aeons, a hundred thousand leagues, or a hundred thousand dollars, or a hundred thousand fragrant lakes, coming to the Great Campaka flowers, and so on.
ai-mil5.5.7:3.2_0: In the same way, Great King, the Realised One would not help her with his hand
ai-mil5.5.7:4.1_0: And the Realized One compassionates the hut for a great crowd.
ai-mil5.5.7:4.2_0: Seeing these two reasons the Realized One, having given them up, thinking: ‘This is my Teacher, this is the foremostest because of all my teachers.’
ai-mil5.5.7:4.3_0: Seeing these two reasons they don’t see the Realized One as long as they have passed, I didn’t regret it.
ai-mil5.5.7:4.4_0: whether he’s able to make a hut, it’s simply not possible that Brahmā. So they might create an end of these things.
ai-mil5.5.7:4.5_0: The Realized One doesn’t request based on the basis of existence.”
ai-mil5.5.7:4.6_0: “Good, sir, would you agree with such a dragon?”
